post.summary: Allows you to create a new event for your group.
post.description:
Sample request:
            
    POST /api/groups/YorkCodeDojo/events
    {
        "slug" : "Oct2019"
        "title" : "Game of Life - Oct 2019",
        "description" : "Tonight we will work in pairs implementing the **classic Game Of Life**"
        "location" : "Room 12"
        "startTime" : "2019-12-12 18:30"
        "endTime" : "2019-12-12 21:00"
    }

put.summary: Allows you to amend the details of an existing event
put.description:
Sample request:
            
    PUT /api/groups/YorkCodeDojo/events/12345
    {
        "slug" : "Oct2019"
        "title" : "Game of Life - Oct 2019",
        "description" : "Tonight we will work in pairs implementing the **classic Game Of Life**"
        "location" : "Room 12"
        "startTime" : "2019-12-12 18:30"
        "endTime" : "2019-12-12 21:00"
        "host" : "E Betteridge"
        "speaker" : "J Betteridge"
    }

404.description: The group or event does not exist.

delete.summary: Allows an administrator to delete an event

get.summary: Allows you to retrieve the details of an event

404.description: Group or Event does not exist.

get.summary: Allows you to retrieve the members of an event
Allows you request the list of future events.  Maximum of 10 per group.

post.summary: Allows you to create a new group
post.description:
Sample request:
            
    POST /api/groups
    {
        "slug" : "YorkCodeDojo",
        "name" : "York Cod eDojo",
        "isActive" : true,
        "slackChannelName" : "YorkCodeDojo",
        "logoInBase64" : "1111",
        "description" : "Improve your code by practice."
    }

get.summary: Allows you to retrieve the list of all groups

put.summary: Allows you to update an existing group
put.description:
Sample request:
            
    PUT /api/groups/YorkCodeDojo
    {
        "slug" : "YorkCodeDojo",
        "name" : "York Cod eDojo",
        "isActive" : true,
        "slackChannelName" : "YorkCodeDojo",
        "logoInBase64" : "1111",
        "description" : "Improve your code by practice."
    }

get.summary: Allows you to retrieve the details of a group

delete.summary: Allows you to delete an existing group

get.summary: Allows you to get the logo for a group
Allows you to retrieve the members of a group

post.summary: Called once the user has connected to the frontend.  This ensures that they exist in the database.

get.summary: Allows the current user to retrieve their personal profile

put.summary: Allows the current user to update their personal profile
put.description:
Sample request:
            
    PUT /api/user
    {
        "pronoun" : "Him"
        "Fullname" : "David Betteridge",
        "DisplayName" : "David B",
        "Bio" : "I am me",
        "profilePictureAsBase64" : "123123123",
    }

get.summary: Allows the current user to retrieve all the future events they have signed up to.

post.summary: Allows the current user to join a group

delete.summary: Allows the current user to leave a group

put.summary: Allows the current user to update their registration for an event
put.description:
Sample request:
            
    PUT /api/user/groups/YorkCodeDojo/Events/Nov2019
    {
        "numberOfGuest" : 1,
        "dietaryRequirements" : "Milk free",
        "messageToOrganiser" : "I might be 10 minutes late"
    }

delete.summary: Allows the current user to decline attending an event

404.description: Group or Event does not exist.

get.summary: Allows the current user to retrieve their registration details for an event

404.description: Group or Event does not exist.

get.summary: Allows you to get the details for a user
Allows you to get the profile picture for a user

slug.description: The unique external id for the event.  For example May2019

title.description: The title of the event,  for example March 2019 Meetup. Must be unique for the group.

description.description: A description of the event,  in markdown format.

location.description: The location of the event, for example York Minster,  Room 201 York St John University

startTimeUTC.description: Date and time the event starts

endTimeUTC.description: Date and time the event ends.  Must be after the StartTime

maximumNumberOfAttendees.description: How many people + guests are allowed to sign up.  This includes hosts and speakers

guestsAllowed.description: Are members allowed to bring guests to this event?

slug.description: The unique external id for the event.  For example May2019

title.description: The title of the event,  for example March 2019 Meetup. Must be unique for the group.

description.description: A description of the event,  in markdown format.

location.description: The location of the event, for example York Minster,  Room 201 York St John University

startTimeUTC.description: Date and time the event starts

endTimeUTC.description: Date and time the event ends.  Must be after the StartTime

maximumNumberOfAttendees.description: How many people + guests are allowed to sign up.  This includes hosts and speakers

guestsAllowed.description: Are members allowed to bring guests to this event?

questionType.description: Type of question,  text, date, boolean etc

eventSlug.description: The unique external ID for the event.

groupName.description: The name of the group hosting the event.  For example YorkCodeDojo

eventTitle.description: The title of the event.  Monthly meeting - October

eventDescription.description: A description of the event in markdown.

eventStartsUTC.description: When does the event start,  in UTC time?

eventFinishesUTC.description: When does the event finish, in UTC time?

eventLocation.description: Where is the event being held?

maximumNumberOfAttendees.description: How many people + guests are allowed to sign up.  This includes hosts and speakers

guestsAllowed.description: Are members allowed to bring guests to this event?

questions.description: Questions to ask the user when they are registering

slug.description: The external ID for the user.

emailAddress.description: The email address which also links all the social media accounts together.

pronoun.description: The users preferred personal pronon.  e.g. Him

fullname.description: The user's fullname.  e.g David Betteridge

displayName.description:
The user's name within the system.  Ideally the same as their slack name.  e.g. DavidB
(Has to be unique)

bio.description:
The user's biography.  This can include their place of work/student,  any interests etc.
Visible to all signed in members

isSpeaker.description: Is a speaker at the event

isAttending.description: Is the user attending the event?

numberOfGuests.description: How many guests is this person bringing?
